Nexa — the AI-powered ERP that’s fast, clear, and secure.

Run finance, operations, and analytics in one place — with AI woven into every module.

Why teams choose Nexa

  • One platform for Billing, Open Banking, HMRC VAT, MFG, WMS, PO, Payroll, Marketplace.
  • RBAC & Separation of Duties built-in. Secure by default.
  • Observability, backups, and DR drills ready from day one.

Key benefits

Out-of-the-box capabilities that grow with you.

AI throughout

Assistants and quick actions in every module to speed up reconciliation, planning, and analysis.

Governance & security

RBAC/SoD, rate limits, secret masking, security headers, and audit trails built-in.

Performance & scale

Fast pages with sensible defaults, pagination, and background jobs designed for scale.

Modules

From finance to operations — activate only what you need.

Billing & Subscriptions

Plans, subscriptions, usage, invoices and Stripe integration.

Open Banking

TrueLayer sandbox, accounts and transactions with masked logs.

HMRC MTD VAT

OAuth, obligations, returns and filing with audit safety.

Manufacturing & MRP

Work orders, BOM, routing, MRP and capacity calendars.

WMS & ASN/Waves

Inbound ASNs, waves, picks and 3PL connectors.

Purchase Orders

Suppliers, POs and lines with reminders and receiving.

See all modules

How Nexa works

Connect

Add keys for Stripe, Open Banking, HMRC, Twilio — or run in demo mode.

Operate

Use the web app and mobile parity screens. Jobs sync and reconcile on a schedule.

Observe

Health, metrics, masked logs and job status — with backups and DR drills ready.
